panels.content:
Cisco Systems - UCS Traffic Monitoring - Location

Global or location specific monitoring of the Cisco UCS infrastructure

targets.query: SELECT "model" AS "Model", "mode" AS "Mode", "ucsm_fw_ver" AS "UCSM firmware", "fi_fw_sys_ver" AS "FI System firmware" FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter group by  "domain" fill(null) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' and $timeFilter) group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "32G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 32) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select count(domain) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY domain)
select count(id) AS "OK" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_state" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select count(id) AS "Other" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_state" != 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select count(id) AS "Blade Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "type" = 'blade') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select count(id) AS "Rack Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "type" = 'rack') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND chassis!='') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cpus") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cores") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("memory") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vFCs") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vEths") FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,blade,id)

SELECT location as "Location", domain as "Domain",  chassis as "Chassis ID", id as "Server", model as "Model", serial as "Serial", num_cpus as "# CPU", num_cores as "# Cores", memory as "Memory", operability as "Operability", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_state_code, num_vEths as "# vEth", num_vFCs as "# vFC" FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service_profile",domain,chassis,id order by time desc limit 1

SELECT location as "Location", domain as "Domain",  chassis as "Chassis ID", id as "Server", model as "Model", serial as "Serial", num_cpus as "# CPU", num_cores as "# Cores", memory as "Memory", operability as "Operability", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_state_code, num_vEths as "# vEth", num_vFCs as "# vFC" FROM "autogen"."Servers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service_profile",domain,chassis,id order by time desc limit 1

panels.description: Combined Ethernet TX/RX traffic across all UCS domains at $location location(s)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "TX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

panels.title: Ethernet Traffic - Total

panels.description: Combined FC TX/RX traffic across all UCS domains at $location location(s)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "TX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

panels.title: FC Traffic - Total

panels.description: **Use Case**: Most and least busy locations, AKA top-talker and bottom-talker locations **How to use**: Monitor the traffic pattern over time in the graph. Sort by clicking on the avg or current.

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport,location fill(linear)

panels.description: **Use Case**: Most and least busy service profiles, AKA top-talker and bottom-talker blades **How to use**: Monitor the traffic pattern over time in the graph. Sort by clicking on the avg or current.

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "TX Traffic" FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport,domain,chassis,service_profile fill(linear)

panels.title: Top FC traffic - Egress - per service profile breakdown

targets.query: SELECT sum("fcs_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "FCS" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("out_discard_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "Out Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("crc_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "RX CRC" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "RX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_tx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "TX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("link_failures_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "Link Failures" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("signal_losses_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "Signal losses" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("sync_losses_delta")  / [[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "Sync losses" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms),transport fill(linear)

panels.description: **Use Case**: High-level indication of congestion at the selected location(s) **How to use**: Look for a sustained spike in PAUSE frame rate which is a an indication of congestion. This data is not conclusive due to averaging over a location. To find the exact point of congestion, continue digging further into location > Domain > Chassis > Service profile. **Details**: - The graph show PAUSE frame on FI server ports which are connected to IOM. - PAUSE frames are sent by a traffic receiver when it is unable to receive the traffic at the incoming rate. - Focus on (sustained) spikes only because PAUSE frames may be exchanged under normal condition also.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("pause_rx"))/[[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "PAUSE against Inbound Traffic" FROM "FIServerPortStats" WHERE "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),location fill(linear)

panels.title: PAUSE against inbound traffic (RX Pause) on server ports

panels.description: **Use Case**: High-level indication of congestion at the selected location(s) **How to use**: Look for a sustained spike in PAUSE frame rate which is a an indication of congestion. This data is not conclusive due to averaging over a location. To find the exact point of congestion, continue digging further into location > Domain > Chassis > Service profile. **Details**: - The graph show PAUSE frame on FI server ports which are connected to IOM. - PAUSE frames are sent by a traffic receiver when it is unable to receive the traffic at the incoming rate. - Focus on (sustained) spikes only because PAUSE frames may be exchanged under normal condition also.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("pause_tx"))/[[polling_interval]]/([[__interval_ms]]/([[polling_interval]] * 1000)) AS "PAUSE against Outbound Traffic" FROM "FIServerPortStats" WHERE "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),location fill(linear)

panels.title: PAUSE against Outbound traffic (TX Pause) on server ports

targets.query: select top("TX Traffic",10) as "TX Traffic",domain,chassis,service_profile from (SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]]/(($__to - $__from)/60000) AS "TX Traffic" FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY transport,domain,chassis,service_profile fill(linear))

panels.title: Top FC traffic - Egress - service profile

targets.query: select top("TX Traffic",10) as "TX Traffic",domain,chassis,service_profile from (SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]]/(($__to - $__from)/60000) AS "TX Traffic" FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY transport,domain,chassis,service_profile fill(linear))

panels.title: Top FC traffic - Egress - service profile

list.definition: show tag values from Servers with key=location where $timeFilter
